content: minecraft panda supplies crochet hooks o 5 mm for most parts o 3 5 mm for muzzle sewing needle stuffing yarn i used red heart super saver o white o black or dark brown optional small knitting needles stitch glossary single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet scbp = single_crochet back post st3bptg = stitch 1 scbp 1 hdbp and 1 scbps together invisible st3tog = stitch 3 scs together using only the front loops of the row below corner series = in a single stitch on the corner of your square crochet a single_crochet a half_double_crochet and another single_crochet all in that same stitch this creates a distinct corner 180 series = single_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet all in one stitch to create two corners around the end of the chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch inv decrease = invisible decrease invisible color changes there are many color changes throughout this pattern to keep the colors from two adjacent but different colored stitches from look messy do an invisible color change let s say you re switching from yellow to black during your last yellow stitch gather all the loops of yarn required by the specific stitch type you are doing on your hook in yellow except for the very last loop yarn over in black yarn for this very last loop and pull it through all the yellow loops on your hook to finish off your stitch the crochet stitch you just finished will still be all yellow but the loop on your hook will be black now you are ready to crochet your first black stitch below is an example of finishing off a last yellow single_crochet stitch before a color change important joining rounds this pattern is not crocheted in a spiral in order for the colors in this pattern to end up where they are intended to go you must follow these steps to finish off a round and start the next round 1 after finishing the last stitch in a round slip_stitch into the first stitch pink of that same round 2 chain 1 and pull on the back side blue of the loop of yarn left on your hook to tighten the chain you just did into what will look almost like a knot you are ready for the first stitch of the next round the last picture shows a first stitch in the next round 3 this round join does not count as one of the stitches called for by the pattern for each row it is done in addition to all the stitches called out in the pattern nose use 3 5 mm hook and white yarn round 1 single_crochet 4 in magic_ring 4 round 2 corner series x4 12 round 3 scbps around 12 tie off and squish into a rectangular shape using black yarn and a sewing needle sew a triangle nose on note in the pictures in this pattern i will be using brown instead of black because it is easier
